import React from "react"; const Cart = ({ cart, changeQuantity }) => { return (

Cart

Book Quantity Price
{cart.map((book) => { return (
{book.title} CHF {(book.salePrice || book.originalPrice).toFixed(2)}
changeQuantity(book, event.target.value) } />
CHF {( (book.salePrice || book.originalPrice) * book.quantity ).toFixed(2)}{" "}
); })}
Subtotal {}
Tax CHF1.00
Total CHF10.00
); }; export default Cart;
